trans-unit.source: StorSimple hardware components and status | Microsoft Azure
trans-unit.target: StorSimple hardware components and status | Microsoft Azure

trans-unit.source: Learn how to monitor the hardware components of your StorSimple device through the StorSimple Manager service.
trans-unit.target: Learn how to monitor the hardware components of your StorSimple device through the StorSimple Manager service.

trans-unit.source: Use the StorSimple Manager service to monitor hardware components and status
trans-unit.target: Use the StorSimple Manager service to monitor hardware components and status

trans-unit.source: This article describes the various physical and logical components in your on-premises StorSimple device.
trans-unit.target: This article describes the various physical and logical components in your on-premises StorSimple device.

trans-unit.source: It also explains how to monitor the device component status by using the Maintenance page in the StorSimple Manager service.
trans-unit.target: It also explains how to monitor the device component status by using the Maintenance page in the StorSimple Manager service.

trans-unit.source: The Maintenance page shows the hardware status of all the StorSimple device components.
trans-unit.target: The Maintenance page shows the hardware status of all the StorSimple device components.

trans-unit.source: Under the list of components for 8100, there are three sections that describe:
trans-unit.target: Under the list of components for 8100, there are three sections that describe:

trans-unit.source: Shared Components – These are not part of the controllers, such as disk drives, enclosure, PCM components and PCM temperature, line voltage, and line current sensors.
trans-unit.target: Shared Components – These are not part of the controllers, such as disk drives, enclosure, PCM components and PCM temperature, line voltage, and line current sensors.

trans-unit.source: Controller 0 Components – The components that reside on Controller 0, such as controller, SAS expander and connector, controller temperature sensors, and the various network interfaces.
trans-unit.target: Controller 0 Components – The components that reside on Controller 0, such as controller, SAS expander and connector, controller temperature sensors, and the various network interfaces.

trans-unit.source: Controller 1 Components – The components that constitute Controller 1, similar to those detailed for Controller 0.
trans-unit.target: Controller 1 Components – The components that constitute Controller 1, similar to those detailed for Controller 0.

trans-unit.source: An 8600 device has additional components that correspond to the Extended Bunch of Disks (EBOD) enclosure.
trans-unit.target: An 8600 device has additional components that correspond to the Extended Bunch of Disks (EBOD) enclosure.

trans-unit.source: Under the list of components, there are five sections.
trans-unit.target: Under the list of components, there are five sections.

trans-unit.source: Of these, there are three sections that contain the components in the primary enclosure and are identical to the ones described for 8100.
trans-unit.target: Of these, there are three sections that contain the components in the primary enclosure and are identical to the ones described for 8100.

trans-unit.source: There are two additional sections for the EBOD enclosure that describe:
trans-unit.target: There are two additional sections for the EBOD enclosure that describe:

trans-unit.source: EBOD enclosure Shared Components – The components present in the EBOD enclosure and PCM that are not part of the EBOD controller.
trans-unit.target: EBOD enclosure Shared Components – The components present in the EBOD enclosure and PCM that are not part of the EBOD controller.

trans-unit.source: EBOD Controller 0 Components – The components that reside on EBOD enclosure 0, such as the EBOD controller, SAS expander and connector, and controller temperature sensors.
trans-unit.target: EBOD Controller 0 Components – The components that reside on EBOD enclosure 0, such as the EBOD controller, SAS expander and connector, and controller temperature sensors.

trans-unit.source: EBOD Controller 1 Components – The components that constitute EBOD enclosure 1, similar to those detailed for EBOD enclosure 0.
trans-unit.target: EBOD Controller 1 Components – The components that constitute EBOD enclosure 1, similar to those detailed for EBOD enclosure 0.

trans-unit.source: The hardware status section is not present in the Maintenance page for a StorSimple virtual device (1100).
trans-unit.target: The hardware status section is not present in the Maintenance page for a StorSimple virtual device (1100).

trans-unit.source: Perform the following steps to view the hardware status of a device component:
trans-unit.target: Perform the following steps to view the hardware status of a device component:

trans-unit.source: Navigate to Devices, select a specific StorSimple device.
trans-unit.target: Navigate to Devices, select a specific StorSimple device.

trans-unit.source: Click to go into the device-level menu and then click the Maintenance tab.
trans-unit.target: Click to go into the device-level menu and then click the Maintenance tab.

trans-unit.source: Locate the Hardware Status section and choose from the available components (as described above).
trans-unit.target: Locate the Hardware Status section and choose from the available components (as described above).

trans-unit.source: Simply click an arrow preceding the component label to expand the list and view the status of the various device components.
trans-unit.target: Simply click an arrow preceding the component label to expand the list and view the status of the various device components.

trans-unit.source: See the <link><linkText>detailed component list for the primary enclosure</linkText><title></title></link> and the <link><linkText>detailed component list for the EBOD enclosure</linkText><title></title></link>.
trans-unit.target: See the <link><linkText>detailed component list for the primary enclosure</linkText><title></title></link> and the <link><linkText>detailed component list for the EBOD enclosure</linkText><title></title></link>.

trans-unit.source: Use the following color coding scheme to interpret the component status:
trans-unit.target: Use the following color coding scheme to interpret the component status:

trans-unit.source: Red exclamation – Denotes a component that has a Failure or Needs Attention status.
trans-unit.target: Red exclamation – Denotes a component that has a Failure or Needs Attention status.

trans-unit.source: White with black text – Denotes a component that is not present.
trans-unit.target: White with black text – Denotes a component that is not present.

trans-unit.source: If you encounter a component that is not in a Healthy state, please contact Microsoft Support.
trans-unit.target: If you encounter a component that is not in a Healthy state, please contact Microsoft Support.

trans-unit.source: If alerts are enabled on your device, you will receive an email alert.
trans-unit.target: If alerts are enabled on your device, you will receive an email alert.

trans-unit.source: If you need to replace a failed hardware component, see <link><linkText>StorSimple hardware component replacement</linkText><title></title></link>.
trans-unit.target: If you need to replace a failed hardware component, see <link><linkText>StorSimple hardware component replacement</linkText><title></title></link>.

trans-unit.source: Component list for primary enclosure of StorSimple device
trans-unit.target: Component list for primary enclosure of StorSimple device

trans-unit.source: The following table outlines the physical and logical components contained in the primary enclosure of your on-premises StorSimple device.
trans-unit.target: The following table outlines the physical and logical components contained in the primary enclosure of your on-premises StorSimple device.

trans-unit.source: One line is presented for each of the SSD or the HDD drives in the primary enclosure.
trans-unit.target: One line is presented for each of the SSD or the HDD drives in the primary enclosure.

trans-unit.source: Measures the temperature within the chassis.
trans-unit.target: Measures the temperature within the chassis.

trans-unit.source: Measures the temperature of the mid-plane.
trans-unit.target: Measures the temperature of the mid-plane.

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the audible alarm subsystem within the chassis is functional.
trans-unit.target: Indicates whether the audible alarm subsystem within the chassis is functional.

trans-unit.source: Indicates the presence of a chassis.
trans-unit.target: Indicates the presence of a chassis.

trans-unit.source: Refers to the front panel of the chassis.
trans-unit.target: Refers to the front panel of the chassis.

trans-unit.source: Numerous line voltage sensors have their state displayed, which indicates whether the measured voltage is within tolerance.
trans-unit.target: Numerous line voltage sensors have their state displayed, which indicates whether the measured voltage is within tolerance.

trans-unit.source: Numerous line current sensors have their state displayed, which indicates whether the measured current is within tolerance.
trans-unit.target: Numerous line current sensors have their state displayed, which indicates whether the measured current is within tolerance.

trans-unit.source: Numerous temperature sensors such as Inlet and Hotspot sensors have their state displayed, indicating whether the measured temperature is within tolerance.
trans-unit.target: Numerous temperature sensors such as Inlet and Hotspot sensors have their state displayed, indicating whether the measured temperature is within tolerance.

trans-unit.source: One line is presented for each of the power supplies in the two PCMs located in the back of the device.
trans-unit.target: One line is presented for each of the power supplies in the two PCMs located in the back of the device.

trans-unit.source: One line is presented for each of the four cooling fans residing in the two PCMs.
trans-unit.target: One line is presented for each of the four cooling fans residing in the two PCMs.

trans-unit.source: One line is presented for each of the backup battery modules that are seated in the PCM.
trans-unit.target: One line is presented for each of the backup battery modules that are seated in the PCM.

trans-unit.source: Displays the state of the batteries: whether they need charging and are approaching end-of-life.
trans-unit.target: Displays the state of the batteries: whether they need charging and are approaching end-of-life.

trans-unit.source: Displays the state of the cluster that is created between the two integrated controller modules.
trans-unit.target: Displays the state of the cluster that is created between the two integrated controller modules.

trans-unit.source: Indicates the state of the controller as part of the cluster.
trans-unit.target: Indicates the state of the controller as part of the cluster.

trans-unit.source: Indicates the presence of the majority disk membership in the HDD storage pool.
trans-unit.target: Indicates the presence of the majority disk membership in the HDD storage pool.

trans-unit.source: The storage space that is used for data in the hard disk drive (HDD) storage pool.
trans-unit.target: The storage space that is used for data in the hard disk drive (HDD) storage pool.

trans-unit.source: The space reserved in the HDD storage pool for management tasks.
trans-unit.target: The space reserved in the HDD storage pool for management tasks.

trans-unit.source: The space reserved in the HDD storage pool for cluster quorum.
trans-unit.target: The space reserved in the HDD storage pool for cluster quorum.

trans-unit.source: The space reserved in the HDD storage pool for controller replacement.
trans-unit.target: The space reserved in the HDD storage pool for controller replacement.

trans-unit.source: The storage space used for data in the solid state drive (SSD) storage pool.
trans-unit.target: The storage space used for data in the solid state drive (SSD) storage pool.

trans-unit.source: The storage space in the SSD storage pool that is dedicated for NVRAM logic.
trans-unit.target: The storage space in the SSD storage pool that is dedicated for NVRAM logic.

trans-unit.source: Displays the state of the logical storage pool that is created from device HDDs.
trans-unit.target: Displays the state of the logical storage pool that is created from device HDDs.

trans-unit.source: Displays the state of the logical storage pool that is created from device SSDs.
trans-unit.target: Displays the state of the logical storage pool that is created from device SSDs.

trans-unit.source: Displays the state of the controller, and whether it is in active or standby mode within the chassis.
trans-unit.target: Displays the state of the controller, and whether it is in active or standby mode within the chassis.

trans-unit.source: Numerous temperature sensors such as I/O module, CPU temperature, DIMM and PCIe sensors have their state displayed, which indicates whether or not the temperature encountered is within tolerance.
trans-unit.target: Numerous temperature sensors such as I/O module, CPU temperature, DIMM and PCIe sensors have their state displayed, which indicates whether or not the temperature encountered is within tolerance.

trans-unit.source: Indicates the state of the serial attached SCSI (SAS) expander, which is used to connect the integrated storage to the controller.
trans-unit.target: Indicates the state of the serial attached SCSI (SAS) expander, which is used to connect the integrated storage to the controller.

trans-unit.source: Indicates the state of each SAS connector, which is used to connect integrated storage to the SAS expander.
trans-unit.target: Indicates the state of each SAS connector, which is used to connect integrated storage to the SAS expander.

trans-unit.source: Indicates the state of the mid-plane connector, which is used to connect each controller to the mid-plane.
trans-unit.target: Indicates the state of the mid-plane connector, which is used to connect each controller to the mid-plane.

trans-unit.source: Indicates the state of the processor cores within each controller.
trans-unit.target: Indicates the state of the processor cores within each controller.

trans-unit.source: Indicates the state of the power system used by the enclosure.
trans-unit.target: Indicates the state of the power system used by the enclosure.

trans-unit.source: Indicates the state of the diagnostics subsystems provided by the controller.
trans-unit.target: Indicates the state of the diagnostics subsystems provided by the controller.

trans-unit.source: Indicates the state of the baseboard management controller (BMC), which is a specialized service processor that monitors the hardware device through sensors and communicates with the system administrator via an independent connection.
trans-unit.target: Indicates the state of the baseboard management controller (BMC), which is a specialized service processor that monitors the hardware device through sensors and communicates with the system administrator via an independent connection.

trans-unit.source: Indicates the state of each of the network interfaces, that is, the management and data ports provided on the controller.
trans-unit.target: Indicates the state of each of the network interfaces, that is, the management and data ports provided on the controller.

trans-unit.source: Indicates the state of NVRAM, a non-volatile random access memory backed up by the battery that serves to retain application-critical information in the event of power failure.
trans-unit.target: Indicates the state of NVRAM, a non-volatile random access memory backed up by the battery that serves to retain application-critical information in the event of power failure.

trans-unit.source: Component list for EBOD enclosure of StorSimple device
trans-unit.target: Component list for EBOD enclosure of StorSimple device

trans-unit.source: The following table outlines the physical and logical components contained in the EBOD enclosure of your on-premises StorSimple device.
trans-unit.target: The following table outlines the physical and logical components contained in the EBOD enclosure of your on-premises StorSimple device.

trans-unit.source: One line is presented for each of the HDD drives in the front of the EBOD enclosure.
trans-unit.target: One line is presented for each of the HDD drives in the front of the EBOD enclosure.

trans-unit.source: Measures the temperature within the chassis.
trans-unit.target: Measures the temperature within the chassis.

trans-unit.source: Measures the temperature of the mid-plane.
trans-unit.target: Measures the temperature of the mid-plane.

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the audible alarm subsystem within the chassis is functional.
trans-unit.target: Indicates whether the audible alarm subsystem within the chassis is functional.

trans-unit.source: Indicates the presence of a chassis.
trans-unit.target: Indicates the presence of a chassis.

trans-unit.source: Refers to the OPS or the front panel of the chassis.
trans-unit.target: Refers to the OPS or the front panel of the chassis.

trans-unit.source: Numerous line voltage sensors have their state displayed, which indicates whether the measured voltage is within tolerance.
trans-unit.target: Numerous line voltage sensors have their state displayed, which indicates whether the measured voltage is within tolerance.

trans-unit.source: Numerous line current sensors have their state displayed, which indicates whether the measured current is within tolerance.
trans-unit.target: Numerous line current sensors have their state displayed, which indicates whether the measured current is within tolerance.

trans-unit.source: Numerous temperature sensors such as Inlet and Hotspot sensors have their state displayed, which indicates whether the measured temperature is within tolerance.
trans-unit.target: Numerous temperature sensors such as Inlet and Hotspot sensors have their state displayed, which indicates whether the measured temperature is within tolerance.

trans-unit.source: One line is presented for each of the power supplies in the two PCMs located in the back of the device.
trans-unit.target: One line is presented for each of the power supplies in the two PCMs located in the back of the device.

trans-unit.source: One line is presented for each of the four cooling fans residing in the two PCMs.
trans-unit.target: One line is presented for each of the four cooling fans residing in the two PCMs.

trans-unit.source: Displays the state of the logical storage pool that is created from device HDDs.
trans-unit.target: Displays the state of the logical storage pool that is created from device HDDs.

trans-unit.source: Displays the state of the controllers in the EBOD module.
trans-unit.target: Displays the state of the controllers in the EBOD module.

trans-unit.source: Numerous temperature sensors from each controller have their state displayed, which indicates whether the temperature encountered is within tolerance.
trans-unit.target: Numerous temperature sensors from each controller have their state displayed, which indicates whether the temperature encountered is within tolerance.

trans-unit.source: Indicates the state of the SAS expander, which is used to connect the integrated storage to the controller.
trans-unit.target: Indicates the state of the SAS expander, which is used to connect the integrated storage to the controller.

trans-unit.source: Indicates the state of each SAS connector, which is used to connect integrated storage to the SAS expander.
trans-unit.target: Indicates the state of each SAS connector, which is used to connect integrated storage to the SAS expander.

trans-unit.source: Indicates the state of the mid-plane connector, which is used to connect each controller to the mid-plane.
trans-unit.target: Indicates the state of the mid-plane connector, which is used to connect each controller to the mid-plane.

trans-unit.source: Indicates the state of the power system used by the enclosure.
trans-unit.target: Indicates the state of the power system used by the enclosure.

trans-unit.source: Indicates the state of the diagnostics subsystems provided by the controller.
trans-unit.target: Indicates the state of the diagnostics subsystems provided by the controller.

trans-unit.source: Indicates the state of the connection between the EBOD I/O module and the device controller.
trans-unit.target: Indicates the state of the connection between the EBOD I/O module and the device controller.

trans-unit.source: If you need to troubleshoot a device component that has a degraded or failed status, refer to
trans-unit.target: If you need to troubleshoot a device component that has a degraded or failed status, refer to

trans-unit.source: To replace a failed hardware component, see <link><linkText>StorSimple hardware component replacement</linkText><title></title></link>.
trans-unit.target: To replace a failed hardware component, see <link><linkText>StorSimple hardware component replacement</linkText><title></title></link>.

trans-unit.source: If you continue to experience device issues, <link><linkText>contact Microsoft Support</linkText><title></title></link>.
trans-unit.target: If you continue to experience device issues, <link><linkText>contact Microsoft Support</linkText><title></title></link>.
